name: Covid '99
storyline:
A VIRUS KNOWN AS 'COVID' IS SPREADING ACROSS THE 'WORLD WIDE WEB' AND INFECTING PEOPLE THROUGH THEIR COMPUTERS. MEDICAL TECHNOLOGY NOW ALLOWS YOU TO ASSUME DIRECT CONTROL OF IMMUNE SYSTEM CELLS OVER THE INTERNET - YOU MUST USE YOUR WHITE BLOOD CELL PADDLE TO DEFLECT VIRUSES AWAY FROM THE PATIENT'S LUNGS!

YOU ARE NOT ALONE- OTHER INTERCELL AGENTS WILL CONTECT TO THE IMMUNE SYSTEM, AND THEY CANNOT BE TRUSTED! DESTROY THEM BY SENDING THEM AS MANY VIRUSES AS YOU CAN. YOU MUST BE THE LAST CELL REMAINING TO SAVE THE PATIENT!
summary: Covid '99: Paddle Royale is a virus-themed browser battle royale game that currently hosts 50-player matches. The game has synthwave music, and retro-computer-styled graphics, and share some gameplay elements from other popular .io games and battle royale games.
